00018 SqlConnection::SqlConnection() {
00019     /*
00020      *check the existence of the database driver.
00021      */
00022    if (!QSqlDatabase::isDriverAvailable (dbDriverStr))
00023     {
00024        /*
00025         *Gui message that informs that the driver does not exist
00026         */
00027        QMessageBox::critical(0,dbConnectErrorStr,dbDriverNotExistStr);
00028 
00029        /*
00030         *@return false if database connection failed.
00031         */
00032        //return false;
00033        exit(1);
00034    }
00035   /*
00036    *connect to the database with the following driver.
00037    */
00038    db = QSqlDatabase::addDatabase(dbDriverStr);
00039 
00040    bool flag = isDbExist ();
00041 
00042    db.setDatabaseName(dbFileNameStr);
00043 
00044    dbConnect();
00045 
00046    if (!flag)
00047        dbCreateInstance();
00048 }

00050 /*
00051  *connect to database
00052  */
00053 bool SqlConnection::dbConnect()
00054 {
00055    /*
00056     *Open database, if the database cannot open for any reason print a warning.
00057     */
00058     if (!db.open())
00059    {
00060         /*
00061          *Gui message that informs that the database cannot open
00062          */
00063         QMessageBox::critical(0,dbConnectErrorStr,dbCannotOpenStr);
00064 
00065         /*
00066          *@return false if database connection failed.
00067          */
00068         return false;
00069     }
00070 
00071     /*
00072      *@return true if database connection successed
00073      */
00074       return db.isOpen();
00075 
00076 }
00077 /*
00078  *disconnects from a database
00079  */
00080 bool SqlConnection::dbDisconnect()
00081 {
00082     /*
00083      *close database
00084      */
00085     db.close();
00086     if(!db.isOpen())
00087     {
00088         /*
00089          *@return true if database closed
00090         */
00091         return true;
00092     }
00093     else
00094         /*
00095          *@return false if not closed
00096          */
00097         return false;
00098 }

00102  */
00103 bool SqlConnection::isDbExist()
00104 {
00105     /*
00106      *@return true if file exist
00107      */
00108     return dbFile.isFileExist(dbFileNameStr);

00122 /*
00123  *create a database instance
00124  */
00125 bool SqlConnection::dbCreateInstance()
00126 {
00127     bool ret = false;
00128 
00129     /* create and setup a progress bar. */
00130     int step = 0;
00131     QProgressDialog progress;
00132     progress.setWindowModality(Qt::WindowModal);
00133     //progress.setWindowTitle(appName);
00134     //progress.setCancelButtonText(QString()); /* hide cancel button. */
00135     progress.setLabelText(dbCreationStr);
00136     progress.setMinimum(step);
00137     progress.setMaximum(PBAR_MAX_STEPS);
00138 
00139     /* start progress. */
00140     progress.setValue(++step);
00141 
00142     /*
00143      *declare a QSqlQuery object
00144      */
00145     QSqlQuery query;
00146     /*
00147      *check if database is open
00148      */
00149     if(db.isOpen())
00150     {
00151 
00152     progress.setValue(++step);
00153     ret = query.exec("create table Groups (prIdGroup INTEGER PRIMARY KEY , "
00154                                         "GroupName VARCHAR(25))");
00155 
00156     progress.setValue(++step);
00157     if(ret)
00158     {
00159 
00160     ret = query.exec("create table Customers (prIdCustomer VARCHAR(25) PRIMARY KEY , "
00161                                         "CustomerName VARCHAR(25) ,"
00162                                         "CustomerSurname VARCHAR(25) ,"
00163                                         "GroupId INTEGER)");
00164     }
00165     progress.setValue(++step);
00166     if(ret)
00167     {
00168     ret = query.exec("create table Rooms (RoomNumber INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,"
00169                                         "RoomFloor INTEGER ,"
00170                                         "Capacity INTEGER ,"
00171                                         "Extras TEXT )");
00172     }
00173 
00174     progress.setValue(++step);
00175     if(ret)
00176     {
00177     ret = query.exec("create table Prices (RoomCapacity INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,"
00178                                            "Price DOUBLE)");
00179     }
00180 
00181     progress.setValue(++step);
00182     if(ret)
00183     {
00184     ret = query.exec("create table Users (UserId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,"
00185                                            "Name VARCHAR(25) , "
00186                                            "Surname VARCHAR(25) ,"
00187                                            "Username VARCHAR(25) , "
00188                                            "Password VARCHAR(25),"
00189                                            "Role VARCHAR(15))");
00190     }
00191 
00192     progress.setValue(progress.maximum());
00193     if(ret)
00194     {
00195     ret = query.exec("create table RoomsReservation (prIdReservation INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , "
00196                                         "DateFrom TEXT ,"
00197                                         "DateTo TEXT ,"
00198                                         "fkCustomerId VARCHAR(25) ,"
00199                                         "fkRoomId INTEGER ,"
00200                                         "FOREIGN KEY (fkCustomerId) REFERENCES Customers,"
00201                                         "FOREIGN KEY (fkRoomId) REFERENCES Rooms)");
00202 
00203     }
00204 
00205      progress.setValue(++step);
00206     if(!ret)
00207     {
00208         QMessageBox::information(0,dbConnectErrorStr,dbCreationStr);
00209         FileHandler rm;
00210         db.close();
00211         rm.removeFile(dbFileNameStr);
00212     }
00213 }
00214 
00215     return ret;
00216 }
